## Agenda of the Workshop

#### **2-Feb** 

-   9:00-9:15 Introduction ([Dr. Guillermo Montoya](https://www.cpr.ku.dk/research/protein-structure-function-program/montoya/))

-   9:15-9:30 Intro to CFIM ([Tillmann Pape](https://www.cpr.ku.dk/staff/montoya-group/?pure=en/persons/595110))

-   9:30-10:30 Lecture1: Sample preparation for single particle averaging (Tillmann Pape)

-   11:00-12:15 Lecture 2: Data collection strategies (Tillmann Pape)

-   13:15-14:45 Lecture 3: EM theory (transmission electron microscope, image formation, focus, phase contrast, contrast transfer function, image processing, resolution ([Nicholas Taylor](https://www.cpr.ku.dk/research/protein-structure-function-program/taylor/))

Break

-   15:45-17:00 Lecture 4: Cryo-electron tomography and subtomogram averaging. ([Simon Erlendsson](https://www.cpr.ku.dk/staff/?pure=en/persons/303206))

#### **3-Feb** 

-   9:00-10:30 Lecture 5: cryoSPARC ([Nicholas Sofos](https://www.cpr.ku.dk/staff/?id=579310&vis=medarbejder))

-   11:00-12:30 Lecture 9: Alphafold in Model building (Chimera, ChimeraX & Coot) ([Dr.Eva Kummer](https://www.cpr.ku.dk/research/protein-structure-function-program/kummer/))

Lunch

-   13:30-14:30 Lecture 10: X-ray crystallography, CryoEM, phasing and Phenix Refine (Guillermo Montoya)

#### **4-Feb** 

-   10:00-11:15 Lecture 6: CisTEM ([Pablo Mesa](https://www.cpr.ku.dk/staff/?pure=en%2Fpersons%2Fpablo-mesa(a2d4d7ab-b0f1-484c-a79e-cddd6444458c).html))

-   11:45-12:00 Lecture 7: Relion (Pablo Mesa)

-   13:00-14:00 Lecture 7: Relion (Pablo Mesa)

Break

-   14:30-15:30 Lecture 8: Introduction to cryoDRGN (Pablo Mesa)
